00080     public SRGCWSCS(Test test, Inputs inputData) 
00081     {
00082         aTest = test;
00083         inputs = inputData;
00084         savingsList = createSavingsList(inputs);
00085         cwsAlg = new RandCWS(aTest, inputs);
00086         startTime = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00087         cwsSol = cwsAlg.solve(savingsList, false);
00088         
00089         cwsSol.setTime(ElapsedTime.calcElapsed(startTime,
00090                 ElapsedTime.systemTime()));
00091         // printSolOnScreen(cwsSol, true);
00092     }
00093 
00103     public Outputs solveInTimeAndIterations() 
00104     {
00105         // Set initial variables
00106         startTime = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00107         double elapsed = 0.0;
00108         Solution ourBestSol = cwsSol; // our best solution so far
00109         Solution newSol;
00110         int nRuns = 1;
00111         double maxTime = aTest.getMaxTime();                                                                
00112         
00113         // Multi-start iterative process
00114 
00115         while (nRuns <= aTest.getnIterRandCWS() && elapsed < maxTime) 
00116         {
00117                 // Find a new solution to the problem    
00118             newSol = cwsAlg.solve(savingsList, true);
00119 
00120             // Update elapsed time
00121             elapsed = ElapsedTime.calcElapsed(startTime, ElapsedTime.systemTime());
00122 
00123             // Update our best solution so far
00124             if (newSol.getCosts() < ourBestSol.getCosts()) 
00125             {
00126                 newSol.setTime(elapsed);
00127                 ourBestSol = newSol;
00128             }
00129 
00130             // Update number of runs performed
00131             nRuns++;
00132 
00133         }
00134 
00135         System.out.println(aTest.getInstanceName() + " " + cwsSol.getCosts() + " "
00136                 + ourBestSol.getCosts() + " " + ourBestSol.getTime());
00137 
00138         printSolOnScreen(ourBestSol, false);
00139         Outputs out = new Outputs(aTest, cwsSol, ourBestSol);
00140 
00141         return out;
00142     }
00143

00155     public Outputs solveInTime() 
00156     {    
00157         // Set initial variables
00158         startTime = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00159         double elapsed = 0.0;
00160         Solution ourBestSol = cwsSol;
00161         Solution newSol; 
00162         double maxTime = aTest.getMaxTime();
00163 
00164          
00165        int nSolutions = 0;
00166         
00167         while (elapsed < maxTime) 
00168         {
00169 
00170             // Find a new solution to the problem
00171             newSol = cwsAlg.solve(savingsList, true);
00172 
00173             // Update elapsed time
00174             elapsed = ElapsedTime.calcElapsed(startTime, ElapsedTime.systemTime());
00175 
00176             // Update our best solution so far
00177             if (newSol.getCosts() < ourBestSol.getCosts()) {
00178                 newSol.setTime(elapsed);
00179                 ourBestSol = newSol;
00180             }
00181             
00182             nSolutions ++;
00183         }
00184 
00185         System.out.println("instancia: "+aTest.getInstanceName()+" costCws: "+
00186                 cwsSol.getCosts() +" tempCWS: "
00187                +cwsSol.getTime()  + " costBS: "+ ourBestSol.getCosts() 
00188                + " RutesBS: "+ ourBestSol.getRoutes().size()
00189                + " tempBS: "+ ourBestSol.getTime() + " solutions: "+ nSolutions);
00190 
00191         Outputs out = new Outputs(aTest, cwsSol, ourBestSol);        
00192         
00193         return out;
00194     }

00207      public Outputs splitAndSolve()
00208      {
00209          // Set initial variables
00210         startTime = ElapsedTime.systemTime();
00211         double elapsed = 0.0;
00212         Solution ourBestSol = cwsSol; // our best solution so far
00213         Solution newSol;
00214         double maxTime = aTest.getMaxTime();
00215 
00216         // Multi-start iterative process
00217         while (elapsed < maxTime) 
00218         {
00219                 // Find a new solution to the problem
00220             Split split = new Split(inputs);
00221             newSol = split.splitSolve(aTest, 4);
00222 
00223             // Update elapsed time
00224             elapsed = ElapsedTime.calcElapsed(startTime, ElapsedTime.systemTime());
00225 
00226             // Update our best solution so far
00227             if (newSol.getCosts() < ourBestSol.getCosts()) 
00228             {
00229                 newSol.setTime(elapsed);
00230                 ourBestSol = newSol;
00231             }
00232         }       
00233         Outputs out = new Outputs(aTest, cwsSol, ourBestSol);
00234 
00235         return out;
00236      }

00246     private Edge[] createSavingsList(Inputs input) 
00247     {
00248         input.fillEdgeList();
00249         Edge[] array = input.getEdgeList();//create the array that contain the edges
00250         // Sort using the compareTo() method of the Edge class (TIE ISSUE #1)
00251         Arrays.sort(array);
00252         return array;
00253     }
00254 
00262     private void printSolOnScreen(Solution aSolution, boolean isCWSSol) 
00263     {
00264         if (isCWSSol == true) 
00265         {
00266             System.out.print("\n** CWS Solution: ");
00267         } else 
00268         {
00269             System.out.print("\n** CWS = " + cwsSol.getCosts() + "; Seed = "
00270                     + aTest.getSeed() + "; OBS = " + aSolution.getCosts()
00271                     + "; Time = " + aSolution.getTime());
00272         }
00273     }

00280     public Solution getCwsSol() 
00281     {
00282         return cwsSol;
00283     }
